name: Sunchild
description:
The principle:

Sun which communicates with a child during the game is telling the child which color or shape to pick.

The goal of the game is to pick up 7 colored keys or shapes. After that you can start picking golden hearts up, which opens you door to an exciting ending.

Supported languages:
English, Czech


This game is still kind of in development. I will be so glad for any feedback, such as info about bugs, or any advice on getting the game better. 

Thank you for trying this game out ! It means a lot to me !

Contact email: repicsoft.games@gmail.com
